TopicTitle: EveCube Eve land-and-return vehicle (launcher and tug included!)

Articles.Content:
EveCube is pure stock one person lander and ascent vehicle able to reach 100x100 low Eve orbit starting from around 3500 m of elevation (lowers start possible, but not tested). Launch vehicle for lander and interplanetary tug included.

Spaceport link

What in the box:

.craft file for lander itself (236 parts):

.craft file for lander with launcher able to reach 200x200 LKO (672 parts):

.craft file for interplanetary tug with launcher able to reach 200x200 LKO (529 parts):

Additional notes:

- EveCube orbital stage doesn't have any RCS, but is small and agile enough to make docking without it.

- EveCube has single action group: 1 - toggle ladders.

- Launch vehicle is simple 3 stage crossfeed 446 parts deisgn.

- Kit doesn't include any way to bring kerbal creaw back to Kerbal surface! You need to provide your own descent capsule! Tug has second large docking port specialy for this purpose.
